author: {'steamid': '76561198184543925', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1454787774}
review: Voto negativo por una razón, y es el hecho de los BUGS, que he encontrado. El más molesto me lo he encontrado al final del último nivel (4), en el que hay una gran rueda con pinchos. Pues bien, esos pinchos se esquivan cambiando al otro lado de la circunferencia, y me he encontrado con que NO se podía pasar por niguno de los dos (ni fuera ni dentro), por lo que el juego en sí no lo he podido completar después de 800 vidas gastadas sólo en ese nivel. Conclusión, ni loco vuelvo a intentar conseguir pasarmelo. Entre la dificultad y situaciones como la de los pequeños circulos que hacen que sea cuestión de suerte completar el nivel no merece la pena. Eso sí, por 1 $ , puedes echar 1 hora y poco más de entretenimiento, que es lo que te durará el juego (a excepción del modo "infinito", modo tipo supervivencia)

author: {'steamid': '76561197982564095', 'num_games_owned': 697, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1682640777}
review:
[b][u]TL;DR:[/u][/b]

Good, short game. Try to pick it up on sale. Solid soundtrack that fits well with the game.
8/10

[b][u]Full Review:[/u][/b]

~ [i]Description[/i] ~

oO is a 2D game where you're a ball on the perimeter of a circle, and with a click you switch from either going around the inside of the circle or the outside. This is used to travel between circles and progress through the levels and to avoid spikes on your way.

~ [i]Gamemodes[/i] ~

[list]
[*] 4 levels of increasing difficulty and new obstacles every level.
[*] Endless mode, which gets harder as you go on, and every circle you progress through increases your score by one.
[*] Bonus versions of each level, where everything has a wobbly effect, causing it to look like the ball is speeding up/slowing down, but it's still moving at the same consistent speed as in the normal levels.
[/list]

~ [i]Pros![/i] ~

[list]
[*] I picked up the game for only $0.89 when it was on sale
[*] Good music that didn't get annoying throughout multiple hours of playtime.
[*] Amazing level design and cycles that are easy to understand but hard to master
[*] Very simple controls. Literally one button. (Space bar or Left Click)
[*] When you die, you go back to the most recent checkpoint, and it restarts the cycle at a specific point, which makes the game far less frustrating than it may first seem.
[/list]

~ [i]Meh's...[/i] ~

[list]
[*] I feel like the game scammed me a few times when switching from circle to circle, but that's probably just me trying to find an excuse to say it wasn't me.
[*] When you use the menu button in the upper left corner while in a level, your ball switches sides of the circle before the menu pops up. It's a minor bug but it can screw you over sometimes.
[*] No way to save your progress mid-level, but it doesn't really matter since the levels are somewhat short and can be done pretty quickly if you have practice and you know what you're doing.
[/list]

~ [i]Cons![/i] ~

[list]
[*] There are only four levels, plus the Endless mode, and no level creator/editor, making the game quite short.
[*] The game may trigger motion sickness on the later levels if you're a bit sensitive to it.
[/list]

~ [i]Achievements[/i] ~

There are 6 achievements, one for beating each of the main levels, one for hitting a score of 15 in Endless, and one for hitting a score of 100 in Endless.

It may be due to my lack of experience in the game and/or just sucking at it in general, but hitting a score of 100 in Endless seems practically impossible to me at the moment.

~ [b][i]Conclusion[/i][/b] ~

If you really want the game, you can go ahead and pick it up for the full $3, but I would honestly wait for it to go on sale at least a little before getting it. I picked it up at the end of the Steam Winter Sale for just $0.89 and I'd consider that absolutely worth it.

The game itself is pretty entertaining and also got intense for the last two levels. Easy to pick up, difficult to master.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084891266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1461705902}
review:
In similar vein to games like Super Hexagon, 140, Gauge and Duet, oO is a minimalistic game with simple objectives and simple controls - on the surface. But while things may look easy enough at first glance, the challenge comes in mastering the sparse mechanics you are given to get past whatever sadistic obstacles oO's glowing, circular world cares to throw in your direction.

With ever more complex patterns to overcome and a faster and faster rate of play, the simple "push space to flip" mechanic might only be one button but will eventually build to challenge even the fastest of reflexes. You will die again, and again, and again [spoiler]and again, and again, and again, and again, and again[/spoiler]; but unlike some other punishing titles of similar ilk, the deaths here don't tend to feel cheap. You'll always know why you died, and what you need to do to avoid death next time.

oO has four main levels, with four optional "drunk" levels and two endless modes which are again normal and drunk. Minimalistic, punishing games like this aren't often to everyone's liking, but I'm a huge fan of 'em and always gun for total completion before moving on. I'm currently on the final drunk level and am slowly going insane trying to complete it - but mental stability aside, oO is a fantastic little entry to the "easy to learn, punishing to master" genre, and I hugely recommend it.

So! With all the familiarities out of the way, I guess there's only one question left to ask you:
Are you ready to die?

author: {'steamid': '76561197996686480', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1452747204}
review:
о - очко, и если это вам мало говорит об игре, то в названии есть ещё большая О
что означает много очков которые вы не должны получить ведь их дают за смерть. Ваше же о будет пылать на протяжении всех 10 уровней, каждый из которых жарче другого. Последние два так вообще каждый раз случайно генерируются, там только одна жизнь и за тобой идёт кровавый поток, понятно откуда. Игра своеобразный вызов, проверяющий вашу реакцию и выдержку.
Сюжета нет.
Графония нет.
Музыка с пивом пойдёт.
Геймплей залипательный.
Своих денег стоит. (примерно 30р)
10 оО из 10

review: Holy David Bowie's shiny glass balls this is amazing. Well designed levels that ramp up in difficulty exponentially. I lost the same amount of lives in the 3rd level that I did in a single section in the 4th level! I expected literally nothing for my $1 but was pleasantly surprised. You will hate yourself but should probably try it. Dev please make more games; I want to be hurt more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118846454', 'num_games_owned': 534, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1219, 'last_played': 1589342474}
review: Хорошая игра. Движущийся по окружности шарик нужно перемещать в следующую окружность, преодолевая при этом различные препятствия. Управление - клик мышки. Первые два уровня не сильно сложные, дальше - хард. Есть также режим выживания, который мне больше всего понравился. Сколько играю - вообще не надоедает. Рекомендую. Своих денег игра однозначно стоит.

review: 本来以为是一款抖M游戏  结果这是一款令恶心到死的抖M游戏。。。。   刚开始玩或许还觉得不错   到后面玩得头晕脑袋疼。。。。有种一直在往转的错觉。。。。     不过这个还是可以接受的

author: {'steamid': '76561198174941343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1440519523}

author: {'steamid': '76561198066552374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1511587720}
review:
It's a cheap one button game that's easy to wrap your head around, and isn't actually that difficult at all once you understand it. At least, I didn't have much trouble getting through it, but I don't cringe or get emotional when I die.

It's pretty clean, and for the price if you like your one button games, then you can safely enjoy a few hours with this.

I wish the music was catchier, it's too ambient for my tastes, and I feel like some  rhythm could be a nice addition. I liked the trippy levels for the visual effect, but don't see the allure of playing them per se.

It's a case of a game that delivers whats on the tin. You can tell what this game is about, and it is about that.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995905130', 'num_games_owned': 576, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1451947489}
review: oO is a reaction based game similar to Super Hexagon but perhaps with a little planning/puzzle aspect too in the levels. It's a very small game but takes quite a while to get through (because of its difficulty, level 4 feels almost impossible for me), plus an endless mode. I don't find the endless mode interesting for very long but maybe that's just because I'm bad at it. It's mostly just repeated sections. The game is really fun in short doses, and trying to beat your record, if you like that sort of thing. Nice visuals and soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021045675', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 191, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1451858268}
review: oO is a very difficult minimalistic game which involves moving from circle to circle by timing your input at the point the two circles meet. It very quickly becomes difficult as obstacles like spikes and moving circles appear as you progress. It's a fun little game but also frustrating at times. Be prepared to die a lot, as I found out dying 400+ times on the last level! If you're into games like super hexagon and the impossible game then you can't go wrong with this. For just 79p it's a great little game to add to your collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079977261', 'num_games_owned': 344, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1456346118}

review: O jogo é facinante! Tem uma proposta inovadora e é extremamente simples. Esse jogo seria uns dos melhores que já joguei se houvesse um final. Poderia até ter umas letrinhas subindo ou sei lá qualquer coisa pelo menos. Eu detesto jogos que não tenham final! O jogo não trás aquela sensação de término. A última fase fica só no record. Esses jogos existiam no tempo do Atari. Jogo sem final. Horrível. Por pouco os caras acertaram. Se fizessem isso seria um dos melhores jogos do planeta.

review:
I bought this game for less than 10 cents, played it for a while and then called it a rage quit. Several months later I found out they added achievements, so I played it for another while and rage quitted once again. I would say it's worth the 10 cents, but I wouldn't spend more than that on this game.

Warning: Do not buy oO if you get easily frustrated.

review:
[h1]ПЛЮСЫ Оо[/h1]
+ Цена.

+ Простое управление.
[h1]МИНУСЫ Оо[/h1]

Еще хочу отметить что эта игра стоит ваших денег. И я готов был бы заплатить намного больше. Хорошие идеи стоят дорого. Хорошее настроение - беcценно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056488707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1448023385}
review:
So what is oO? That's a good question...
If you're after something easy and relaxing... this AINT it ;)
In oO you play as a little Circle, and you goal is to progress from circle to circle without much trouble initially.
But the further you get, the difficult ramps up and you'll end up needing to memorise certain areas to pass them. (After failing dozens of times at least)
If the original levels aren't enough, there's a variation of each, (I call it drunk mode)
Spikes, high speed movement, memorisation of patters and MORE spikes!
Let's not forget the survival level... Want to take it slow? NOPE! You've got a big scary red wall chasing you, and it only get faster for each checkpoint you hit.

Super fun game, and super cheap too! Highly Recommended for those with quick reflexes!

author: {'steamid': '76561198126901681', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1568558266}

author: {'steamid': '76561197991465987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1533033545}
review:
While it's so easy to fail with such a minimalist game, the creator of oO hasn't put a foot wrong. The game is simple, the controls are (actually, the control is) snappy, the fast gameplay leaves hardly any margin for error, and that makes the completion of the levels all the more satisfying. Very enjoyable, very much recommended.

Also, my 2c on the Kongregate topic: if you played the game on Kongregate, and you enjoyed it, I'd recommend to buy it to support the developer. Especially since It's only 1 EUR.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997056470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1447264614}
review:
Was erwartet man für unter 1€? 
Wenn die Antwort ist: Ein Spiel das mit eigenen Reflexen und Maus oder Tastatur gespielt wird und einen oft nahezu dazu bringt etwas in den Monitor werfen zu wollen, weil ein doppelklick erst im rettenden moment nicht, dann wenn er einen umbringen würde, aber sehr wohl funktioniert, DANN ist es das Perfekte Spiel für einen.

Was sonst noch? Mehrspielermodus hab ich nicht gefunden bis jetzt. Ob es den nur einfach nicht gibt oder ich ihn nicht finde weiß ich nicht, da die einzelnen "level" sowie auch der endlosmodus nicht beschriftet sind. Das könnte man besser machen.

review:

Jogo simples, jogabilidade mais simples ainda, trilha sonora empolgante e um grau de dificuldade bem desafiante - ainda mais se for para conseguir o achievement "This is sick!", lhe garanto que perderá alguns fios de cabelo.

MUITO recomendado!

author: {'steamid': '76561198016567145', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1218, 'last_played': 1556787329}
review:
Snatched it for less than half a euro, now I can't seem to quit it. Addicting and brutally unforgiving, this game is every bit as fun after 40 hours than it is when you first play it. For me, at least. Fairly easy learning curve, went up to 97 in endless mode (which is insanely difficult) after a week of playing and still going strong.

Great game. 10/10
(fuck the green level, honestly)

author: {'steamid': '76561198032369659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1443902108}
review:
Starts out as a fairly challenging puzzle reflex game, but very quickly turns into nothing but frustration. Even though it does a few neat things in terms of level design, the lack of any other interesting mechanincs makes traveling  through these interesting levels really boring. Soundtrack is mediocre and visuals are simple yet pleasing. One thing i noted whilst playing the 2nd level was what SEEMED like input lag, where i hit spacebar and the related action would happen 0.5 seconds later. In a  game that requires split second reactions in order to proceed, this is a major drawback.

Summary:
Mechanics - Only one mechanic that's incorperated well into the level design.
Soundtrack - Nothing amazing, but it's not bad
Visuals - Simple stuff, nothing amazing
Final opinion - Wouldn't recomend this game unless you literally have nothing else to do

review:
You'll get angry,
A lot of times you will die.
You'll get fulfilled,
But more times you will cry.

Switch with haste,
Avoid the dangers.
Plot out your course,
Be a stealthy ranger.

It's easy to understand,
Frustratingly hard to put down.
But it's worth the pain & pleasure,
Anger & joy go 'round and 'round.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217277224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1584988793}
review:
Вы сомневаетесь, брать ли эту игру? Однозначно ДА, скажу я вам.
Это тот случай, когда вы не будете жалеть о 0,79$, потраченных на это чудо игровой индустрии.
==================
ПЛЮСЫ:
1. Предельно простой геймплей, управляемый одной кнопкой
2. Приятные звуки и музыка
3. Ненавязчивая графика, которая даст отдохнуть вашим глазам после графонистых шутеров
4. Невероятные уровни, пройти которые не так просто, как кажется. Запустив игру, вы лишь на 1 уровне помрёте около 100 раз.
5. Креативная геометрия
---------------------------
МИНУСЫ:
ОЧЕНЬ высокая сложность, доводящая до эпилепсии. На один из уровней можно потратить час чистого времени, но не факт, что вы не бросите игру на десятой минуте.
==================
ВЫВОД:
Игра классная, поможет вам развить в себе реакцию, мышление, нервный тик и голосовые связки.
ВИДЕО ПО ИГРЕ:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Szv6VAQOuWM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QB7DsDkGhwY

author: {'steamid': '76561198003095380', 'num_games_owned': 1514, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1442652145}
review:
Dalajlama XIV [i]"Sztuka szczęścia. Poradnik życia"[/i]

[i]"Spokój umysłu to pełen wrażliwości stan zakorzeniony w miłości i współczuciu".[/i]

=============================================================

jestem spokojny. 
współczuję sobie, że zdecydowałem się włączyć tę grę.
kocham to, że zrobił ją mój rodak !

gra to li tylko klikanie Lewym Przyciskiem Myszy. 
kontrolujemy ciało i umysł białej kropki, która ma ADHD. nie umie się zatrzymać sama, chyba że zginie.
zasadniczo przeskakujemy z okręgu w okrąg na ich stykach, unikawszy na późniejszych etapach zabójczych wypustek.

co jest w tej grze najlepszego ? syndrom "jeszcze raz". 
upartość popłaca, cierpliwość również.
oraz droga mysz, względnie klawiatura.

czemu ?

większe opory przed zniszczeniem wybranego kontrolera.

================================================

Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

author: {'steamid': '76561198237224060', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1450361147}
review:
немного о игре.
Вы играете шариком который перемещается по кругам с препятствиями и контрольными точками.
Геймплей:
со 2-го уровня игра становится более хардкорная вплане того что вы будете часто умирать. Но вы не бросите эту игру т.к она не надоедает. Вам становится интересно пройти этот уровень. Ну и собственно эта игра развивает вашу реакцию. Простое управление, вам нужно только нажимать пробел или ЛКМ (кому как оно удобно)
Музыка/Звуки: 
Вполне приятные нережущие уши звуки.
Очень хорошая цена 29 рублей
10 уничтоженных пробелов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198085825627', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1562774134}
review: Seremos verdadeiros, quem não gosta de jogos viciantes de celular? Pode-se dizer o quanto quiser não irá afetar nada sua dignidade, oO é um jogo estilo celular (obviamente) que está no pc só pra pegar um pouco mais do dinheiro. Não dá pra dizer dos gráficos, fica meio que óbvio, mas em relação de trilha sonora realmente é ruim, apenas representando pouquissimas músicas, que pra falar a verdade, nem são boas. Compre apenas pra gastar umas 1 ou quem sabe 2 horas de sua vidinha, um jogo nada demais, mas viciante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046809398', 'num_games_owned': 1792, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1441961534}
review:
🥄Vous cherchez un super-hexagon-like ? Celui-ci coûte 1€ et si vous accrochez, il y en a pour quelques heures. Un bémol cependant. N'espérez pas le 100% succès. Le dernier du mode infini semble assez inaccessible. (Si vous le décrochez ça vaut le coup de l'afficher, il a été atteint par 0,6% des joueurs...)
____________________________

barème à titre indicatif (c'est un ressenti personnel - sans 🍴🍹 aux évaluations négatives)
🥄s'il vous plaît juste une cuillère pour goûter
🍙🥄juste un bol de temps en temps mais pas tous les jours
🍙🍣🥄 rudement bon dans son genre mais... mais !
🍙🍣🍱🥄miam excellent, manque juste un petit qqchose !
🍙🍣🍱🍹😍(vous je sais pas mais) jusqu'à l'indigestion
____________________________

[h1]Le temps d'un café[/h1]
(5/6 succès en 6h, acheté à 1€)

*Rage* *rage* *raAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGE* (╯°□°)╯︵ ┻━┻
Si vous êtes en manque de super hexagon, plusieurs possibilités s'offrent à vous. Vous pouvez relancer super hexagon mais il est atrocement difficile. Ou bien vous pouvez essayer velocibox, c'est la même chose mais en 3D vue subjective. Ou alors vous pouvez vous balancer sur pivvot, difficile lui aussi mais plus relaxant. Ou sinon il y a ce jeu !

Ca se joue avec un seul bouton. Soit la barre espace, soit le clic de la souris. Un clic vous pose à l'intérieur, un autre clic à l'extérieur. Et ensuite il y a des cercles. Le but est de passer de l'un à l'autre en gérant les obstacles et changements de rythme. C'est un concentré de rage. Un truc horrible. Heureusement il y a des points de sauvegarde. Pas beaucoup mais bien placés. Et un mode infini sans point de sauvegarde pour les plus fous.

Et à la fin de chaque niveau un sentiment d'accomplissement. Comme pour tous les jeux fous fous de ce genre, faciles à apprendre mais follement difficiles à maîtriser.
____________________________
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2467929931]Entre autres[/url]

review:

ただし、エンドレスはやっぱりイカレてる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009526542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1448286868}
review:
[table][tr][th][h1][b]FR[/b][/h1][/th][th][h1][u]Découverte du jeu[/u] : [/h1][/th][th] V 0.1[/th][/tr][/table]

[table][tr][th][h1][b]Description & Gameplay.[/b][/h1][/th][/tr][/table]

oO est un jeu facile à prononcer mais pas à finir. 

Le jeu est simple, vous avancez automatiquement le long des lignes de "cercles" et un clic vous fait changer de côté de la ligne. 
Un concept simple, mais c'est à vous de gérer vos déplacements pour avancer et survivre et c'est là que ça se complique.
Différentes tailles, vitesses, des déformations visuelles, des pièges dynamiques... Autant vous prévenir le jeu est un chouilla dur.

Après chaque section dans un niveau, vous avez un point de respawn pour sauvegarder votre progession tout de même, et le jeu est là pour vous rappeller gentiment le nombre de mort que vous avez eu sur chaque niveau.

[table][tr][th][h1][b]Ambiances sonores et graphismes.[/b][/h1][/th][/tr][/table]

Côté graphique, le jeu en 2d est très coloré, et fluide. Les animations ont un bon rendus, et les musiques/bruitages rendent le tout fort sympathique.
C'est encore une fois simple, mais ça n'enlève rien à la qualité du jeu. 

[table][tr][th][h1][b]Conclusion.[/b][/h1][/th][/tr][/table]

Lorsque je dit que ce jeu est simple d'un point de vue du concept, des graphismes ou de la bande son, ce n'est nullement péjoratif, c'est vraiment pour décrire l'état du jeu.

Le gros intêret du jeu réside en son challenge qui réussira à provoquer [strike]rage et...[/strike], le guerrier qui sommeil en vous pour réussir à progresser !!!

Comme d'habitude, des screens du jeu sont disponibles sur steam et n'hésitez pas à poser vos questions.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988128287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1441065606}
review:
Comment expliquer ce jeu...comment l'expliquer...
Vous avez des reflexes,vous réflechissez vite,vous aimez qu'un jeu vous complique la vie?

alors ce jeu est pour vous: un die and retry hardcore ou le jeu va vous demander des reflexes au poil de cul pret une erreur vous recommencez. le telephone sonne,vous recommencez.votre gamin chiale,vous recommencez...certe il y a des points de sauvegarde,et c'est un circuit unique par niveau a l'exception du no limit,mais franchement ces points de sauvegarde vont vous sauver votre santé mentale!

pro:
-facilité de prise en main
-diversité des piéges et mechanismes qui rendent le jeu affreusement dur
-bande son apaisante...sisi c'est un plus la!

con:
-jeu simpliste en apparence (oui fait bien trouver un truc)
-jeu vraiment hardcore. vous voulez de la facilité oubliez le. le niveau 3 est deja une piéce de bravoure.
-apres avoir joué a ce jeu vous allez avoir un tic a la main si vous jouez a la barre espace,ou au doigt pour si vous jouez a la souris!

author: {'steamid': '76561198161758080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2, 'last_played': 1441298073}
review:
[h1]1.[/h1] [b]Сюжет[/b]: Очень залипательная хрень. Шарик катится по кругу (по часовой стрелке и/или против), а мы должны преодолевать препятствия. [7/10]

[h1]2.[/h1] [b]Графика[/b]: Приятная глазу графика, интересный вариант с эффектом "под водой". [10/10]

[h1]3.[/h1] [b]Геймплей[/b]: Ну это начинает выводить из себя, когда адское количество раз не можешь дойти до точки сохранения. Но продолжаешь играть, т.к. не надоедает. [8/10]

[h1]4.[/h1] [b]Музыка и звуки[/b]: Очень приятная музыка, звуки уши не режут. [10/10]

[h1]5.[/h1] [b]Оптимизация[/b]: Всё путём. [10/10]

[h1][b]Итог:[/b][/h1]
9 оО из 10.

review:
マウスクリックのタイミングだけが全てという、操作の上では単純きわまるゲームだが、少しづつステージのパターンを理解し、上達していく楽しさに、思わず時間を忘れてしまう。いったんクリアしたステージでも、今度は少しでも失敗の回数を減らそうという再挑戦の意欲がわく。ただし、気の短い人や、リズムゲームが極端に苦手な人には向かないかも知れない。とはいえ、この安さだし、とりあえず試しても損はないだろう。

（ここまでで「じゃあ買ってみようか」あるいは「興味ねぇな」と思ったなら、以下は読まなくても結構です）


【ゲームの概要】
様々な大きさの「円」が、円周部分で互いに接した状態で、たくさん連なっている。その円の内側を、一つのドットが一定の速さで回転している。円同士の接点にドットが来た瞬間、タイミングよくマウスクリックすると、隣の円に移動することができる。これを繰り返してゴールまでたどりつけばステージクリアとなる。

なお、円の接点以外の部分でクリックすると、ドットが円の「外側」に移動する（再クリックで戻る）。これは、円に配置された様々なトラップを避けて進むための必須テクニックである。

クリックのタイミングを誤ったり、トラップに衝突すると失敗となり、直前のチェックポイントまで戻される。失敗回数に制限はない。プレイはいつでも中断出来て、前回のチェックポイントから再開可能。

ステージは、大きく2種類に分けられる。

（Ａ）円の配置や大きさ、トラップの位置や種類などが完全に定まっており、それをクリアするのが目的のノーマルステージ（難易度順に４つ）。

（Ｂ）円の移動に1回成功するごとに「次の円」がリアルタイムでランダムに追加されていくサバイバルモード。

さらに、各ステージには、まるで水面に映った風景のように、常にぐにゃぐにゃとステージ全体が歪む効果が付加されたバリエーションも用意されている（トラップや円の配置自体は、ノーマルと同じ）。当然、難易度は上がる。


【蛇足的感想】
一般的なそれとは全く異なる外見だが、このゲームを遊ぶ感覚は、一種の「リズムゲーム」に近いと思う。しかも、一定の拍子ではなく、常に拍子やテンポが変化し続ける「リズムゲーム」。上記の通り、ドットの移動速度自体は一定だが、円の大きさやトラップの周期（＝拍子）が異なれば、当然、移動のタイミングも変化するし、特にトラップ満載のステージでは、「拍子」のパターンを正確に読む（覚える）ことが重要となる。また、円の外側と内側という概念は、「表拍」と「裏拍」に似ている……と、そこまで言ったら、こじつけが過ぎるか。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025468353', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1437976227}
review:
I wasn't expecting much out of this game for $1 but I was pleasantly surprised.  It's not the kind of game you think you'll be coming back to, but there is something addictive in it's simplicity and difficulty.

The concept is as simple as the graphics and the music in this game.  Your a circle, moving inside (or outside) of another another circle.  When you click the mouse, you switch which side of the circle you're in.  Use this simple little ability to move from circle to circle and make a path forward.  Then you start to throw in some spikes and obstacles and the game starts to feel a bit more rewarding.  Then you turn that up to 11 and you're screaming expletives at your computer screen and swearing on your mother's grave you will not be defeated by such a simple concept of a game.  It's fun, addicting, and rewarding.  The visuals are nothing impressive and I preferred to turn the sound off and play my own music, but for $1 it's worth your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128075033', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1457030490}
review:
Schönes Spiel,
da sollte man nich schon wütend rein, sonst ist man dem Nervenzusammenbruch nah oder man dreht völlig durch.
Einfaches Prinzip, aber mit der Zeit werden die Level viel schwieriger, aber dank Checkpoints landet man nich gleich wieder am Anfang. Wenn man ein neues Level geschafft hat, wartet eine noch schwierigere Version davon auf einen . Das einzige was mir persönlich nich gefällt ist die Musik. Ich würde mir noch wünschen, dass man es mit Controller spielen kann, Achievements und noch ein paar Level hinzugefügt. 
Es ist eben ein Spiel für Zwischendurch und die 0,99€  lohnen sich, es warten Suchfaktor (weil man das Level endlich schaffen will) aber auch viele Ragequits.
8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198104451389', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1506836542}
review:
刚入手，玩了前3关。正在努力尝试第4关。短短一个小时已经死了800次。
这个游戏有毒啊。明明又朴素又枯燥，又难的想让人砸电脑，可就是停不下来。
游戏只有鼠标左键一个操作，通过单击控制小球穿越圆圈的边界，从切点穿越可以进入下一个圆圈。
虽然理论上通过观察就可以预判小球的运动轨迹以及合适的操作时机，但是实际上一旦进入游戏节奏就很难冷静下来去思考。
不过前面4关的图都是固定的，所以可以和其他动作游戏一样背版。
而且有些速度快的地方根本没有机会停下来思考，只能靠不断的尝试去掌握操作的节奏。
每关的扭曲模式其实和普通模式是完全一样的，普通模式的节奏记住了，就可以很容易的通过（虽然我扭曲模式明显要多死好多次）
喜欢鬼畜游戏的抖M肯定会爱上这款游戏的。
第5关还没玩，看介绍视频的话是一命挑战模式，不知道是不是随机的，是不是无限的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198204284107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1558775869}
review:
开始入手是因为简洁的画面风格，然后就停不下来了......
系统只记了一个小时，其实离线打了有四五个小时。手残党的福利，对于我这种手废来说难度确实相当大（手动掀桌）。但就是停不下来啊啊啊啊啊啊啊

时间杀手类游戏，绝对不会让人玩腻～

author: {'steamid': '76561198123912576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1499059575}
review:
MOTHER F***KER
Rage, rage and more rage! 
You pass through the first levels very quickly, then the extreme levels come on, the blades start to spin, pop in and out of the circles, the whole world starts to distort.
oO is a rage inducing, fast paced game, You are a little white circle, making your way out of the death ridden area. 
It reminds me of the 2002 web game where you beat the hell out of your computer. Makes me feel the same way.
Overall, its a fun game! 
I give it 7.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150288666', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1437736243}
review:
如果你对刺的恐惧仅仅只是来自I wanna，那么只需一小时oO会刷新你对刺的理解。
首先难度不用说绝对是手残党们的克星。
其次游戏一共五种关卡，以及五种关卡的难度[spoiler]恶心度[/spoiler]提升版(笑)，前两关的话以本人的感觉还是比较容易的，然而等你玩到后两关就能够明白自己有多手残了（各种反应跟不上小球和刺的速度），可以说每一次到达存档点都是对心灵的一种解脱，但如果你把存档点当作解脱那就大错特错了，oO的存档点完全可以理解为新的炼獄的开始，仅能容你在圈圈刺刺中喘息。最后的无尽模式，不仅圈和刺是你的敌人，连容你喘息的时间也成为了对手，你只能在这无尽加速的圈圈刺刺中徘徊，等待时间将你吞噬殆尽。

还是推荐不性急的小伙伴来试试这个有趣又不失难度的游戏，只要0.99刀你就能体验抖M的日常(｀・ω・´)

author: {'steamid': '76561198104045317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1656842661}
review: gloryus!

author: {'steamid': '76561198104538005', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1496447325}
review:
This game follows the same principle of Geometry Dash, but instead of squares and jumping, you control a small ball rolling along the lines of circles, avoiding stationary, moving and disappearing obstacles.

One major con is the number of levels. About 8 levels, plus a survival mode. And there's no leaderboard to compare your performance with other players'.

There really isn't much more to say of what this game's about, except it's definitly a rage game. You'll end up with a headache and with your blood pressure going through the roof - and possibly with a broken mouse/keyboard - but for what it costs, it's difficult not to recommend this game.

If you're bored and tired of complex games, give this one a try. Warning, though: you'll rage.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080600485', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1446083384}
review:
觉得0.99刀的游戏不会踩在你的头上耀武扬威？那你就错了，大错特错了。oO教做人系列正式展开，大圆小圆内刺外刺一起上，让你全然不知所措。当初气壮山河的豪言壮语在疯狂转动的圆圈眼里不值一提！有时候在进入下一个圆时，你发现一边有刺一边没刺，满心欢喜祈祷自己会转到没刺的那边，结果事实总未能如愿，其实是逗你玩的！当内外都有刺的时候，你会突然发现，这款小游戏！让你的鼠标生平第一次有了节奏感！别以为你是lovelive大师你就可以称霸圆圈世界！你觉得你的两根大拇指和一根食指相比哪一个更灵活？哪一个更有节奏感！音乐的话，作为一个杂食，我觉得音乐和节奏氛围吻合得无可挑剔！甚至有几次我都是随着节拍而点鼠标的！
不服？那就花0.99刀买吧。0.99刀，你买到的不仅仅是愉悦，还有痛苦。值！

PS：不仅仅是圆，还有扭曲的圆。扭曲的相切点。总之，还是自己去体验一下痛苦比较好（笑。

9/10 （一分扣在这磨人的小妖精让我体验不到凌驾游戏的乐趣

review:
oO这款游戏是朋友Vvither安利给我的一款游戏，接触之后发现是一个很有趣的反应+策略的游戏。

目前已经通过所有正常关卡，后两关变形关卡由于不想耗费太多时间没有挑战，但是非常值得有HardCore精神的玩家一试！

游戏通过内外圆圈的方式诠释了快速反应&躲避的机制，虽然游戏不是大制作，个人感觉也算是小众精品了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198101223365', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1440496607}
review:
某个基友送我的这款游戏，开始看了看0.99刀，感觉是像大山一样用“心”去玩的游戏（笑~）
然后我看到这游戏只有不到300m，在无聊中打开了这款游戏，然后我感觉这就好比上了贼船，这游戏有毒！！

我自认为自己不是抖m，恩..但这游戏的宗旨就好比o→O的过程，每次打到那种大圈圈有着各种各样的刺的时候我总能自信地说出：我能反杀！！(°∀°)ﾉ    然后就在后面看似简单的无刺小圈上打出了GG(´･_･`)  恩...吓得我差点砸了鼠标。

从某种意义上来说这是个背板的游戏，一路狂奔总会被教做人的，从开始看起来平淡无奇的静止的圆和刺到不停变化的快速的圆和刺，这游戏在一步步把o变成O，还有魔性的背景音乐和扭曲的肥皂泡模式，还有后面节奏越来越快的反人类无尽模式，根本停不下来！！

但是这游戏不推荐手残党和急性子玩，我感觉这对你的电脑并不友好（笑~）就我看来虽然这不是个多耐玩的游戏，而且可能一次次挑战你的忍耐极限，但是0.99刀的价格是绝对不亏的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198039163752', 'num_games_owned': 8779, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1437008632}

review:
이게임에 대해 평가하자면 어느정도 난이도가 있습니다.
슈퍼 핵사곤은 안해봤지만, 그와 비슷한 난이도 아니면 그이상의 난이도입니다.
자신의 컨트롤이 불안하다면 굉장한 쌍욕과 발암을 느끼실수 있습니다.
그렇다고 1달러의 가치치고는 많이 재미있는 게임입니다. 충분한 재미를 느끼실수 있습니다.
하지만 하시다가 던지는 마우스의 값을 보상하지 않습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995829365', 'num_games_owned': 203, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1508615844}
review:
У меня нюх на клевые игры. Эта игра - из таких. 29 рублей - вот цена, которую не жалко заплатить за истерический смех, за 82 смерти при прохождении первого уровня в первый раз, за отличный и простой геймплей, требующий лишь хорошей реакции. Ничего больше.

Эта игра стоит ваших денег. И, скажу по секрету, я готов был бы заплатить и больше. Хорошие идеи стоят дорого. Хорошее настроение - беcценно.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976377650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1436886846}

author: {'steamid': '76561198203878225', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1436290465}
review:
Although I have only played this game for a little over an hour, I have a good idea of the aspects it entails.
oO is a challenging game, theres no doubt about it. With only your mouse or your spacebar, you have to navigate your way through a series of circles with rapidly increasing difficulty. The game, while it might make you frustrated at times, is a simplistic well designed game that is well worth the price and would reccomend to anyone looking for a challenge or is into simplistic or arcade style games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005995466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1436706026}
review:
ストアの動画を見て簡単そうだなっと気軽にポチッったら・・・かなり難しいじゃないのなんの。
一番小さい円だと動きが早すぎて目が追いつかないので勘を頼りにやるしかなかった。
自分の動体視力の衰えを感じたなぁ。
それでもなんとかクリアすることができたので満足。
値段の割りに良く出来てて楽しめる良いゲームなのでおすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198147739317', 'num_games_owned': 1567, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1492578743}
review:
I just bought this game to write a review as I've played this on my Android a lot so please don't go with my Steam Play hours.

Oo is one of my favorite game as it takes some patience for one to get pass a level. This game never gets boring because there's always some randomness which will keep you entertaining.

I've played this game on my Android and am glad they made one for the PC as well. The concept is pretty simple, you have a ball spinning around in the ring and you need to advance by switching from one ring to another where they get connected from.

It's not just that, each level gets more and more tough as these rings have spikes, they move in a wavy shape, screen angles rotate and some rings will drop in randomly.

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
    [*]Lots and lots of hours of fun
    [*]Difficulty at max
    [*]Unique pattern of gameplay on each level
    [*]Minimal Graphics
    [*]Dude, it's just 1$ game (I seriously seriously want that the developer of this game should sell it for 3$ atleast, I won't mind paying even 5$ for such a game honestly)
[/list]

[b]Cons (Actually none but some suggestions infact)[/b]
[list]
    [*]Level editor missing, will be fun to have one
    [*]Need an endless + random endless mode, not sure if it has one as I've not completed the game on my phone
    [*]Can improve graphics
    [*]Increase the damn price xD
[/list]

Again, great piece of work, thanks for making this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024263046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1436465407}
review:
HATE! LOVE! Don't like!
Why?

Hate:
It is a hard game that will punish you for any mistake that you make in which you are given all the details of how to die.

Love:
It is a simple idea and runs with it. It makes getting in and out of the game easy enough that if you only had 15 minutes to play a game, it would be fun (and difficult).

Don't like:
All the wavy levels give me motion sickness. It is hard to say that it is an extra bit of challenge when It feels more like a cop out answer. 

All that aside. I still would recommend anyone that is looking for a hard game without the hard price tag.

P.S. It's stink'n hard and I will crush it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198025472290', 'num_games_owned': 607, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1436818243}
review:
Tough-as-nails precision games like Super Meat Boy must do several things:

1. They must be difficult. 
2. They must make the player feel like they [i]can[/i] clear each stage/board/level, even if it takes 500 attempts.
3. They must strike a balance between the following reactions: (a) Oh, come on -- I [i]totally]/i] landed one pixel to the left! (b) Oh, I timed that just a little wrong. (c) Oh my god. I can't believe I just did that. My incompetence is hilarious.

Oo strikes this balance perfectly. Reflexes, pattern recognition, and tiny bits of critical thinking all combine to make for a beautifully infuriating experience. The wavy boards are just silly, but I don't think they're required.

The music is decent, although I wish I could turn it down without turning it off. The sound design matches the minimalist visuals elegantly.

Well worth the low price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028450654', 'num_games_owned': 5815, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1436283899}
review:
Bei meiner neuesten Gaming-Erfahrung mit dem PC-Spiel "oO" fand ich mich in einem wahren Gefühlschaos wieder. Einerseits fesselte mich das Spiel mit seinem simplen, aber herausfordernden Konzept, andererseits trieb es mich beinahe in den Wahnsinn. Der Einstieg ins Spiel gestaltete sich noch recht unkompliziert: Man navigiert zwischen dem Inneren und Äußeren von Kreisen, wobei gegen Ende des ersten Levels erste Hindernisse auftauchen. Das eigentliche Ziel, von Kreis zu Kreis zu springen, klingt einfach – und genau das macht den Reiz aus.

Im zweiten Level erhöht sich die Komplexität durch sich bewegende und die Form verändernde Kreise, was jedoch noch im Rahmen des Machbaren liegt. Die wahre Herausforderung erwartet einen jedoch im dritten Level. Hier erreicht der Schwierigkeitsgrad eine neue Dimension, die mich regelmäßig an meine Grenzen brachte. Trotz zahlloser Versuche und einem wachsenden Frustpegel, konnte ich nicht davon lassen, es immer wieder zu versuchen.

Wäre das Spiel nur aus diesen frustrierenden Momenten gemacht, würde ich wohl ohne zu zögern einen Daumen nach unten geben. Doch dann gibt es da noch diesen Modus, in dem man plötzlich auftauchende Kreise treffen muss – ohne Vorwarnung, blitzschnelle Reaktionen erfordernd. Dieser Modus, mit seinen stets neuen Herausforderungen, brachte den Spaß zurück ins Spiel. Hier geht es nicht darum, an derselben Stelle zu scheitern, sondern sich immer neuen, unvorhersehbaren Aufgaben zu stellen.

Trotz meiner Neigung, eher einen Daumen nach unten zu geben, muss ich fairerweise zugeben: Für gerade einmal 1 EUR bietet das Spiel mehr Unterhaltungswert, als man zunächst annehmen könnte. Insbesondere für diejenigen, die eine Herausforderung suchen und sich nicht davor scheuen, häufig an derselben Stelle zu scheitern, kann "oO" eine überraschend lohnenswerte Erfahrung sein.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153540405', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1470921773}
review:
Всем привет, я расскажу об этой игре.

[h1]ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ[/h1]

Вам надо нажимать одну кнопку, передвигая шарик с круга на круг. Вам предстоит пройти через препятствия, до конца уровня. Самый последний уровень - бесконечный. Там нету сохранений, и вы играете на рекорд.

[h1]ПЛЮСЫ[/h1]

1. Уникальная аркада, не встречал подобных.

2. Много уровней.

3. Хорошая музыка.

4. Можно играть одной рукой.

5. Цена.

6. Мало занимает места.

[h1]МИНУСЫ[/h1]

1. Мой попец летит где-то над сатурном...

[i][b]27 оО из 27[/b][/i]
